column5: I guess some people just dont get the preocess of how we get meat in the supermarket. Atleast with hunting the animal has a chance. It doesnt just live its life waiting for the butcher shop.
As good as Pammy today on TV.. "save the animals"..... now watch my guaranteed safe, tested on animals inplants jiggle...
^^^  ^^^  They don't jiggle much.  To firm to jiggle..  More of a shake
That has to be a joke. Nobody's quite that stupid.
LOL I guess this is a city person that never got out nowhere LOL Leechman
And I have the plate to prove it!
This guy would make the perfect anchor!!!
What's wrong with that? I thought meat from a supermarket grows on the same tree where money grows.
It might be a French guy.  "Aie  Jean-Jacques....be quiet an keep your head down...I tink it's a hambush!"

Do you think this could be the same WHACKO.  Yea I think Ill get rid of my pet.  Heard about this guy today on the radio.  People are getting more gullible every day http://www.timesonline.co.uk/tol/news/envi...icle6891362.ece
